description: Numbers that have an even number of 0's and an odd number of 1's in binary expansion.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) is(n)=hammingweight(n)%2 && hammingweight(bitneg(n, #binary(n)))%2==0 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 26 2013
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Dec 15 2000.
